channel.title: python on Lynne Cure
channel.description: Recent content in python on Lynne Cure

item.title: Project: Euphy2
item.description: Euphy2 is a Discord bot I wrote with discord.py designed to let users (particularly those in the transgender and nonbinary communities, as well as those questioning) try new names and pronouns quickly and easily.

item.title: Workshop: Writing a Discord Bot
item.description: The following is a workshop I wrote for Virtual CodeDay Spring 2021 designed to give more or less absolute beginners experience in writing their own Discord bots. I’m putting it up here for posterity but also to provide it to anyone who wasn’t able to attend the event.
